fullText:
Grave Flurry

Prerequisite: Revenant, monk, Flurry of Blows class feature
Benefit: Whenever you use your Flurry of Blows power, you can choose to forgo dealing damage to negate the target’s resistance to necrotic damage (if any) until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 389.
